title: Epic Games Unveils New MetaHuman Creator - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.10.21
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about new futuristic tech from Epic, Ubisoft relying less on AAA, and Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury reviews.

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:18 - Housekeeping
It’s a HUGE week at Kinda Funny:
Barrett is back at it like a bad habit! After releasing Zelda In Review last year, Barrett immediately started working on Assassin's Creed In Review: a Kinda Funny Games In Review special, where he played through all 12 mainline games throughout 2020, wrote his reviews for each one, ranked them, and then compiled it all into one 2 hour video for your viewing pleasure! AC In Review releases TODAY, February 10th, at 2:30pm PT on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames as a YouTube Premiere! So watch the video as it debuts, and hang out in the chat with Barrett and other best friends to talk about everything we love about Assassin's Creed!
Also today: the FCF activities begin with the first draft. Come to twitch.tv/kindafunnygames to draft OUR Football team with Snowbike Mike and Greg on Wednesday at 5:30 p.m. PT
Then, Saturday is Wild Aces Game Day -- the Fan Controlled Football season starts with the Wild Aces squaring off against Quavo and Richard Sherman’s Glacier Boyz. We’ll be streaming the game at 5 p.m. PT on Saturday.
AFTER the game, stick around for Love, Sex, and Stuff’s live Valentine’s Day Call-in show.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:09:15 - Epic has revealed their MetaHuman Creator - Nick Statt @ The Verge
00:20:20 - Ubisoft is Moving Away From Reliance on AAA Releases - Rebekah Valentine @ IGN
00:30:55 - Speaking of: Ubisoft Could Rename Rainbow Six: Quarantine - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:37:00 - PS5 DualSense is having some drift issues - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:42:22 -  Ad
00:45:10 - Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury Review Round Up
00:52:05 - We have the title of the Sonic the Hedgehog movie sequel - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:55:45 - Out today
00:59:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and M.H. Williams
